pageContext.claim: “Before my election, violent crime was on the rise, and America saw the steepest two-year consecutive increase in murders in nearly half a century. It was in bad, bad condition. In just a short time, we've reduced the number of murders in America's major cities by more than 10 percent.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a Four Pinocchio claim. A full look at the data shows the president is claiming credit for a long-term trend of declining violent crime.
